website_summaries.verdict: The Salomon Quest Winter GTX won the hearts of hikers, thanks to its warmth and traction. Its waterproofness and ankle support were also well-received by consumers. On the other hand, the boot’s stiff construction caused a minor case of annoyance to some. Overall, hikers who are looking for a warm and grippy boot will appreciate the Quest Winter GTX from Salomon.
pros: The majority gave high marks to the Salomon Quest Winter GTX for its excellent thermal insulation
Droves of users were impressed with the traction of this winter trekker
Its effective waterproofing was recognized by a good number of online consumers
Several wearers praised the ankle support of this footgear
The minority were pleased with the lightness of this Salomon boot
According to some consumers, the Quest Winter GTX runs true to size
cons: A few owners were dismayed with the overall stiffness of this Salomon product

customer_reviews.title: Buckle popped off
customer_reviews.text: My dad had a pair of salomon boot sneakers for several years. At this point he wore them out so much his toes were showing through the top, but he was wearing them for the grip still. I finally got an opportunity to get hom something nice for christmas, and the buckle pops off and he cant tie his shoe 😩 i contacted the seller for a return of this defective shoe and haven’t heard from them. I want to return as these were expensive boots that shouldnt break that soon
customer_reviews.author: Superstar

customer_reviews.title: High quality boot, very confortable
customer_reviews.text: Right out the box, very comfortable and just has a high quality feel, as a ups delivery driver i will be testing the boots in the winter and see how they perform so far the feel good
customer_reviews.author: Alexis gamez

customer_reviews.title: Very good boots, warm enough to wear up to -25 celsius.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, waterproof, warm up to -25 celsius. One thing only questionable - upper parts (shaft) a bit hard and it took a time to wear off. Thank to Wild Sherpa (and Amazon off course) for quick delivering of the boots!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksey

customer_reviews.title: Almost nailed it!
customer_reviews.text: Great boot! Exactly what I wanted. Only issue is my right boot takes on water somehow. I can wear it crossing shallow creeks, and across grassy uplands while the left boot has no issue the right has my foot soaked. Not fun considering I spend roughly 10-12hrs a day in the field and to go that long with a wet foot is a nusence. Espically in the late fall chill.
customer_reviews.author: SurveyFam704

customer_reviews.title: We’ve had several good snow storms here
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had several good snow storms here, these boots kept my feet warm and dry. Very comfortable out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hooker

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Good solid winter boots. Fit as expected. Should do me well.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: true to size so don't wear thick socks with these boots, also they do have a warm lining that makes the boot feel snug to your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing boots. The best. They work very well during the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: These boots or of people that have narrow feet if you have a wide foot it will not work for you they are extremely tight
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking boot excellent but is just very narrow very narrow and extremely tight
customer_reviews.author: Edward MICHAUX

customer_reviews.title: Quality just like the old Salomon days
customer_reviews.text: Really good, just like what you got with every Salomon shoe back before they sold out
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Get these boots for your next Mnt adventure
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable warm hiking boots. They are well insulated, fit true to size and they kept my feet dry!
customer_reviews.author: R. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boot but got a 1/2 size bigger and barley get a sockless foot in it. Needs over wider sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Salomon Quest Winter GTX Men's Trekking Shoes
product_meta.description: Order your Quest Winter GTX hiking shoes from the Hardloop.fr store and discover a large selection of Salomon products. Quest Winter GTX men’s trekking shoes.
